news.summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Reveals What’s Next After Tariffs & Discusses These 10 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. In his appearance on CNBC’s Squawk on the Street on Thursday, […]
Zacks.com users have recently been watching P&G (PG) quite a bit. Thus, it is worth knowing the facts that could determine the stock's prospects.
PG's global reach and brand strength support long-term growth, but valuation, China headwinds and macro risks warrant a cautious, hold-worthy outlook.
In the closing of the recent trading day, Procter & Gamble (PG) stood at $158.26, denoting a -1.23% change from the preceding trading day.
